page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: The only school in the area is the Primary school in Hopton Wafers. Children between four and a half to eleven attend this school. At the moment there is thirty seven on roll. The secondary school is at Cleobury. Children from eleven to sixteen attend this school. There is over six hundred children on roll. If the teenagers want further education they either go to the sixth form college in Ludlow , or the college in Bridgnorth. The primary school at Cleeton closed in 1976 owing to falling numbers and the children were transferred to Farlow school.
